characters: The scene shows a driver in a vehicle driving on a rural road. There are buildings and trees on both sides of the road. A white van is seen driving in the opposite direction. Later, a red three-wheeled vehicle appears on the left side of the road, with a person visible on it.
summary: The vehicle starts driving on a rural road. A white van passes by in the opposite direction. The vehicle continues driving straight. A red three-wheeled vehicle appears on the left side of the road and the vehicle slows down.
actions: The vehicle initially maintains a steady speed while driving on the road. As a white van approaches from the opposite direction, the vehicle maintains its course and speed. When the red three-wheeled vehicle appears on the left, the vehicle begins to decelerate to avoid a potential collision.
key_objects: 1) Left: Red three-wheeled vehicle, medium distance, approaching the vehicle's path, causing the vehicle to decelerate. 2) Right: Buildings, medium distance, posing a potential obstruction to visibility.
